ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: What resolution do you all play at?
ygData.msgSnippet: under display there is an option to turn full screen same resolutions on or off.  one setting changes your inventory screen from 1024x768 or 800x600 down to
ygData.messageBody:
under display there is an option to turn full screen same resolutions on or
off. one setting changes your inventory screen from 1024x768 or 800x600
down to 640x480 so that it still fills the screen. the other option leaves
your inventory screens at 1024x768 or 800x600, but it is smaller and does
not fill the screen, but also needs no switching by your monitor, so has no
delay.

i only have the options of 640x480, 800x600, and 1024x768. there isn't
higher is there?

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> I had been playing in 1024x768 with Voodoo 3 until Kunark.
> I just got a new system with geforce yesterday, and I am back
> to highest resoultion.
>
> What is this about dispay option for inventory screens?
>
>
> Maravana Vireo
> 51 Bard of Jus Divinum
> Mithaniel Marr
